languages.text: "Я осуждаю и игнорирую высказывание недостойной воровки, презревшей привилегии Адептус Механикус".
"I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
languages.original_text: "Я осуждаю и игнорирую высказывание недостойной воровки, презревшей привилегии Адептус Механикус".

traits.locale_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我正在判断这个窃贼的言论，并准备忽视这些言论。这个不值一提的窃贼并不尊重机械修会的特权。”
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: “我正在判断这个窃贼的言论，并准备忽视这些言论。这个不值一提的窃贼并不尊重机械修会的特权。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «He valorado el comentario de la ladrona indigna que ha insultado los privilegios del Adeptus Mechanicus y he decidido ignorarlo».
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: «He valorado el comentario de la ladrona indigna que ha insultado los privilegios del Adeptus Mechanicus y he decidido ignorarlo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「帝国技術局の特権を軽んじた、無価値な泥棒の発言を評価し、無視しよう」
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局の特権を軽んじた、無価値な泥棒の発言を評価し、無視しよう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verurteile und missachte die Aussage der unwürdigen Diebin, die keinen Respekt vor den Privilegien des Adeptus Mechanicus hat."
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Ich verurteile und missachte die Aussage der unwürdigen Diebin, die keinen Respekt vor den Privilegien des Adeptus Mechanicus hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Considérant que l'indigne voleuse manque de respect aux privilèges de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, sa déclaration est sans intérêt. »
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: « Considérant que l'indigne voleuse manque de respect aux privilèges de l'Adeptus Mechanicus, sa déclaration est sans intérêt. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus olmanın ayrıcalıklarına hürmet etmeyen değersiz hırsızın beyanını düşünüyor ve göz ardı ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am judging and disregarding the statement of the unworthy thief who has disrespected the privileges of the Adeptus Mechanicus."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus olmanın ayrıcalıklarına hürmet etmeyen değersiz hırsızın beyanını düşünüyor ve göz ardı ediyorum."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
